verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lokastulu prashninthuru mari mee raaju Yevarani thana shaktini vinna vaaru Chooda naashinturu gaa, kriste mana Raaraajani utsahinchedamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Vaahanamulu enni yunna gaardhabhamunu Yekkenu thaa nevariyinta nunduno Vaarini yuddarinchunu pareekshincha Aayananu cherchuko nee yandu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yesuni sweekarinchedu vaaregudu aayanatho Thruneekarinchu vaaralu nashinturu Nikkambuga praamukhyamou Prashna idi yochinchi choochuko{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Raajula raaju ayane prabhula prabhuvaayane Nyayavanthudu aayane mahatmudaina Devudu sadaa raajyambaayanade Aananda mondudi{/lang-eng}
